instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00138 stuck on Apple logo
threads.message:
Hi! I'm working on 820-00138 which is not booting to OS. Actually for most of the time it's stuck on Apple logo, there is even no progress bar. Sometimes after many SMC resets it will load OS to user screen or opens boot drive selection, but for most of the time there is only Apple logo. Board has no signs of liquid or other damages. I suspect bad BIOS, could you please share clean one for this board? Or at least clean ME in mine (link below)?


[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/190Zr367kxh1eGChRnHdqqzVw67BuuIg0/view?usp=sharing[/URL]

threads.title: 820-00138 stuck on Apple logo
threads.message:
Check first if you can get into macOS starting in safe mode.

Just for test, not really sure if any clean.
There is also clean ME region for transplant.
[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1IItwwqci7AXGT-ZdhUwXpBoszP6uYbNP/view?usp=sharing[/URL]

threads.title: 820-00138 stuck on Apple logo
threads.message:
It doesn't load system at all, even in safe mode.

EDIT.

I have tried several new BIOS files and on some of them computer doesn't even start, on one which seems to be legit clean ME BIOS computer behaves a bit different - when SSD is plugged in I have nothing on the screen, just backlight and computer is very slow. If I remove SSD I'm able to get to boot menu, but if I will try to run test OS it will get stuck on Apple logo or black screen.

threads.title: 820-00138 stuck on Apple logo
threads.message:
So you can't load even USB macOS?
Check if is possible to install Windows.

threads.title: 820-00138 stuck on Apple logo
threads.message: Correct, I can't load macOS from USB drive. Also windows installer gets stuck while loading, It can't get to istallation screen, just hangs on windows logo.

threads.title: 820-00138 stuck on Apple logo
threads.message:
Check the board in other shell.
Try to discard any device connected to the board.

threads.title: 820-00138 stuck on Apple logo
threads.message: With all devices but LCD disconnected It's still not able to boot into OS on external drive, nor to Windows intstaller. The same in another shell. Bad PCH?

threads.title: 820-00138 stuck on Apple logo
threads.message: May have RAM, or CPU problems...
